General.Name: Fujian Tendering Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Fujian Tendering Co., Ltd. provides engineering supervision, test and inspection, surveying and mapping, and geographic information services in China. It offers investment and financing, government investment/public-private partnership project performance appraisal, state-owned enterprise investment/restructuring, urban and rural areas and real estate development investment, and whole-process consulting services; bidding agency services for various construction projects; and pre-planning, engineering project management, and engineering technical consulting services. The company also provides transportation system testing services; building foundation engineering inspection, building main structure engineering site inspection, building steel structure engineering inspection, construction engineering material inspection, construction engineering indoor environment inspection, municipal engineering material inspection, engineering survey, pipeline inspection, construction reinforcement, and house expropriation services; cost consulting; and data processing and storage, and other services. In addition, it offers housing construction engineering design; urban planning and design; lighting design; engineering and hydrogeological survey; landscape engineering design; cultural and creative planning and design; ancient and modern buildings protection engineering and planning; general engineering contracting; and construction drawing review and other related services. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Fuzhou, China. Fujian Tendering Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Fujian Tendering Purchasing Group Co., Ltd.
